name: Tea Time Sumo
description:
A Coin Pusher Game made for Tri-Jam 156 made using construct3. 

Objective:

Knock Tea Leaves, Coins, and Sugar Cubes off the table but be careful; if you run out of tea cups or knock off too many bombs your Tea Party is cut short.

Controls:

Left & Right Arrows: Rotate Active Piece

Up Arrow or Space: Moves Active Piece Towards Table

NOTE: Once you have started moving up you must continue straight until the piece is 100% within the tables boundaries.

Update: Auto-movement, Lowered Sound Effects & Score on Game Over Page.
Sorry if this is not allowed after submission but I hope people will enjoy the game either way!
